document_data.mainbody:
Kyristans Mysteries was an arcane spellbook penned by the lich and skilled necromancer Kyristan. It contained a plethora of notes covering Kyristans detailed research into his exploration of undeath. The tome also contained four unusual necromantic spells.
This large tome measured  on each side and was  thick. The pages were made from bone with the writing inscribed in blood. The writing in the tome could not be removed by any means. The tomes spine was in fact an actual spine, complete with short ribs encircling the perimeter of the book.
Kyristans Mysteries was last seen around the Year of the Bow, 1354 DR, in Suzail where it was stolen from the Lark.
Kyristans Mysteries contained the following spells
undead familiar • create spectral wizard • evolve • lifeblend
